attributes.action: To prevent Newco (Rangers FC) to unjustly leapfrog into a high position in the SFL.
attributes.additional_details:
Stories are circulating in the media describing mounting pressure from Rangers FC Newco and its allies on the SFL/SPL teams to accept Rangers Newco into division 1.

By signing this petition I'm indicating my displeasure at the moral defiance shown by the Newco & hope that our government will apply an equal amount of pressure to ensure that democratic justice will prevail.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the SFL and/or the SFA.
